resources.string: App helps to set reminders for ToDo list for locations saved by user.
Add each location with name and drag to respective place on map.
View list of locations which are created on Map.Create Add ToDo list for each location.
Make detail ToDo List for selected Location.\n You will be notified when you enter saved location.
Get Notifications for saved location to complete all your ToDo list in more smarter way now!.
